patch 8.2.2072: Vim9: list assign not well tested

Problem:    Vim9: list assign not well tested.
Solution:   Test with different destinations.  Fix white space error.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/da7c20c9531739bdefa9d4418e6765fb181066e9|patch 8.2.2071: Vim9: list assign doesn't except empty remainder list>
patch 8.2.2071: Vim9: list assign doesn't except empty remainder list

Problem:    Vim9: list assign doesn't except empty remainder list.
Solution:   Recognize list assignment with ";".

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2071: Vim9: list assign doesn't except empty remainder list · vim/vim@da7c20c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: list assign doesn't except empty remainder list. Solution: Recognize list assignment with ";".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f0068c5154a99b86b2c4515a4b93c003b2445cf4|patch 8.2.2070: can't get the exit value in VimLeave(Pre) autocommands>
patch 8.2.2070: can't get the exit value in VimLeave(Pre) autocommands

Problem:    Can't get the exit value in VimLeave or VimLeavePre autocommands.
Solution:   Add v:exiting like in Neovim. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7395)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2070: can't get the exit value in VimLeave(Pre) autocommands · vim/vim@f0068c5

attachments.text: Problem: Can't get the exit value in VimLeave or VimLeavePre autocommands. Solution: Add v:exiting like in Neovim. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7395)
